heading.name: Consider Depression
heading.definition: Patients with depression dx in 2+ bills or 2+ visit encounters within last 3 years or most recent PHQ-9 >= 15 in past 3 months
heading.notes: Created for Doctors of BC i) Depression dx in 2+ bills: "Patient Status: Active AND does not have a Current Problem List/Profile item code of 35489007, 366979004 OR starting with 311 OR 296 AND with >=2 Bills with the ICD9 diagnosis code of 50B or starting with 311, 296 in the last 3 years" ii) Depression dx in 2+ visits: "Patient Status: Active AND does not have a Current Problem List/Profile item code of 35489007, 366979004 OR starting with 311 OR 296 AND with >= 2 Visit Encounters with Snomed diagnosis code 35489007 or the ICD9 diagnosis code starting with 311 OR 296 in the last 3 years" iii) Depression PHQ-9 score >= 15: "Patient Status: Active AND does not have a Current Problem List/Profile item code of 35489007 OR starting with 311 OR 296 AND WITH a most recent PHQ-9 score >=15 in the past 3 months"

indicatorQuery.query: SELECT IF ( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( CASE WHEN (fin.dx IS NULL AND fin.billcount >= ${numOfBills}) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) , 0) AS "Number with Depression dx in ${numOfBills}+ bills", IF ( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( CASE WHEN (fin.dx IS NULL AND fin.visitcount >= ${numOfVisits}) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) , 0) AS "Number with Depression dx in ${numOfVisits}+ visits", IF ( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( CASE WHEN (fin.dx IS NULL AND fin.result >= ${obsResult}) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) , 0) AS "Number with PHQ-9 >= ${obsResult}" FROM ( SELECT d.demographic_no AS patient, BILLING.billcount AS billcount, VISIT.visitcount AS visitcount, OBSLAST.result AS result, dxr.dxresearch_code AS dx, dxr.coding_system AS dxs FROM demographic d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT demographic_no, dxresearch_code, coding_system, COUNT(dxresearch_code) FROM dxresearch WHERE status='A' AND ( (LEFT(dxresearch_code, 3) IN ('311','296') AND coding_system = ${dxcodesSysICD}) OR (dxresearch_code IN ('35489007','366979004') AND coding_system LIKE ${dxcodesSysSnoMed}) ) GROUP BY demographic_no ORDER BY demographic_no ) dxr ON d.demographic_no = dxr.demographic_no -- Billed 311,296 in last 3 years LEFT JOIN ( SELECT b.demographic_no AS demographic_no, b.dx_code1 AS dxcode1, b.dx_code2 AS dxcode2, b.dx_code3 AS dxcode3, COUNT(b.demographic_no) AS billcount FROM billingmaster b WHERE ( LEFT(b.dx_code1, 3) IN ('311','296') OR LEFT(b.dx_code2, 3) IN ('311','296') OR LEFT(b.dx_code3, 3) IN ('311','296') OR b.dx_code1 IN ('50B') OR b.dx_code2 IN ('50B') OR b.dx_code3 IN ('50B') ) AND DATE(b.createdate) > ${lowerLimit.billingdate} AND b.demographic_no > 0 GROUP BY b.demographic_no HAVING COUNT(b.demographic_no) > -1 ) BILLING ON (d.demographic_no = BILLING.demographic_no) -- Coded dx during visit encounter in last 3 years LEFT JOIN( SELECT ASSIGNED.demographic_no AS demographic_no, observation_date AS visitdate, uuid, COUNT(ASSIGNED.demographic_no) AS visitcount FROM casemgmt_note note INNER JOIN ( SELECT note_id, CODED.demo_no AS demographic_no FROM casemgmt_issue_notes INNER JOIN ( SELECT ci.id AS id, ci.update_date, ci.demographic_no demo_no FROM issue i INNER JOIN casemgmt_issue ci ON i.issue_id = ci.issue_id WHERE (i.type LIKE ${dxcodesSysICD} AND LEFT(i.code, 3) IN ('311','296')) OR (i.type LIKE ${dxcodesSysSnoMed} AND i.code IN ('35489007','366979004')) ) CODED ON (casemgmt_issue_notes.id = CODED.id) ORDER BY CODED.demo_no ) ASSIGNED ON note.note_id = ASSIGNED.note_id AND -- GET LAST REVISION OF NOTE note.note_id= (SELECT MAX(cmn.note_id) FROM casemgmt_note cmn WHERE cmn.uuid = note.uuid) AND DATE(note.observation_date) > ${lowerLimit.visitdate} GROUP BY demographic_no ORDER BY demographic_no ) VISIT ON (d.demographic_no = VISIT.demographic_no) -- Consider Observation LEFT JOIN ( SELECT m.demographicNo AS demographic_no, m.dataField AS result, m.dateObserved AS dateObserved FROM measurements m INNER JOIN ( SELECT demographicNo, MAX(dateObserved) AS dateObserved FROM measurements WHERE type = ${obsName} GROUP BY demographicNo ) mlast ON m.demographicNo = mlast.demographicNo WHERE m.type = ${obsName} AND m.dateObserved = mlast.dateObserved AND (DATE(m.dateObserved) > ${lowerLimit.obsdate}) AND m.demographicNo > 0 GROUP BY m.demographicNo HAVING COUNT(m.demographicNo) > -1 ) OBSLAST ON (d.demographic_no = OBSLAST.demographic_no) WHERE d.patient_status LIKE ${active} AND d.demographic_no > 0 AND d.provider_no LIKE ${provider} AND d.demographic_no NOT IN ${excludedPatient} ) fin

drillDownQuery.query: SELECT * FROM demographic d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT demographic_no, dxresearch_code, coding_system, COUNT(dxresearch_code) FROM dxresearch WHERE status='A' AND ( (LEFT(dxresearch_code, 3) IN ('311','296') AND coding_system = ${dxcodesSysICD}) OR (dxresearch_code IN ('35489007','366979004') AND coding_system LIKE ${dxcodesSysSnoMed}) ) GROUP BY demographic_no ORDER BY demographic_no ) dxr ON d.demographic_no = dxr.demographic_no -- Billed 311,296 in last 3 years LEFT JOIN ( SELECT b.demographic_no AS demographic_no, b.dx_code1 AS dxcode1, b.dx_code2 AS dxcode2, b.dx_code3 AS dxcode3, COUNT(b.demographic_no) AS billcount FROM billingmaster b WHERE ( LEFT(b.dx_code1, 3) IN ('311','296') OR LEFT(b.dx_code2, 3) IN ('311','296') OR LEFT(b.dx_code3, 3) IN ('311','296') OR b.dx_code1 IN ('50B') OR b.dx_code2 IN ('50B') OR b.dx_code3 IN ('50B') ) AND DATE(b.createdate) > ${lowerLimit.billingdate} AND b.demographic_no > 0 GROUP BY b.demographic_no HAVING COUNT(b.demographic_no) > -1 ) BILLING ON (d.demographic_no = BILLING.demographic_no) -- Coded dx during visit encounter in last 3 years LEFT JOIN( SELECT ASSIGNED.demographic_no AS demographic_no, observation_date AS visitdate, uuid, COUNT(ASSIGNED.demographic_no) AS visitcount FROM casemgmt_note note INNER JOIN ( SELECT note_id, CODED.demo_no AS demographic_no FROM casemgmt_issue_notes INNER JOIN ( SELECT ci.id AS id, ci.update_date, ci.demographic_no demo_no FROM issue i INNER JOIN casemgmt_issue ci ON i.issue_id = ci.issue_id WHERE (i.type LIKE ${dxcodesSysICD} AND LEFT(i.code, 3) IN ('311','296')) OR (i.type LIKE ${dxcodesSysSnoMed} AND i.code IN ('35489007','366979004')) ) CODED ON (casemgmt_issue_notes.id = CODED.id) ORDER BY CODED.demo_no ) ASSIGNED ON note.note_id = ASSIGNED.note_id AND -- GET LAST REVISION OF NOTE note.note_id= (SELECT MAX(cmn.note_id) FROM casemgmt_note cmn WHERE cmn.uuid = note.uuid) AND DATE(note.observation_date) > ${lowerLimit.visitdate} GROUP BY demographic_no ORDER BY demographic_no ) VISIT ON (d.demographic_no = VISIT.demographic_no) -- Consider OBS here if needed LEFT JOIN ( SELECT m.demographicNo AS demographic_no, m.dataField AS result, m.dateObserved AS dateObserved FROM measurements m INNER JOIN ( SELECT demographicNo, MAX(dateObserved) AS dateObserved FROM measurements WHERE type = ${obsName} GROUP BY demographicNo ) mlast ON m.demographicNo = mlast.demographicNo WHERE m.type = ${obsName} AND m.dateObserved = mlast.dateObserved AND (DATE(m.dateObserved) > ${lowerLimit.obsdate}) AND m.demographicNo > 0 GROUP BY m.demographicNo HAVING COUNT(m.demographicNo) > -1 ) OBSLAST ON (d.demographic_no = OBSLAST.demographic_no) WHERE d.patient_status LIKE ${active} AND d.demographic_no > 0 AND ( dxr.dxresearch_code IS NULL AND ((BILLING.billcount IS NOT NULL AND BILLING.billcount >= ${numOfBills}) OR (VISIT.visitcount IS NOT NULL AND VISIT.visitcount >= ${numOfVisits}) OR (OBSLAST.result IS NOT NULL AND OBSLAST.result >= ${obsResult})) ) AND d.provider_no LIKE ${provider} AND d.demographic_no NOT IN ${excludedPatient} ORDER BY d.demographic_no
